author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45776 and adds a variant to the phase-2 HLT timing menu worklow using the `alpaka` and `ticl_v5` modifiers. This should help in spotting issues such as https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46060.

#### PR validation:

```console
runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 29634.750,29634.751,29634.752
```

runs fine.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: add variants to the phase-2 relval workflow running the HLT timing menu, up to step2
